import React from 'react' import { useState } from "react"; import ModalNav from './ModalNav'; export default function HeaderNav() { const [modalActive, setModalActive, inModalActive,] = useState(false); const [value, setValue, vala, setVala, vali, setVali, valu,setValu ] = useState('') function cleaning() { setValue('') setVala('') setVali('') setValu('') } return (
